title: Build extensible web apps with Shiny
text:
Science needs a good framework


An easy framework which
The flexibility to design delightful, intuitive interfaces
The performance to build demanding data applications

title: Build extensible web apps with Shiny
text:
Shiny can help
Shiny is an extensible web application written entirely in Python and is ideal for scientific communication: ::: {.incremental} - Reactive execution makes your app fast - Dynamic user interfaces make them intuitive - Modules make them maintainable - Custom CSS makes them beautiful :::
